column1: exec, hyprctl reload && notify-send "(>///<) Hyprland Reloaded"
exec, cliphist list | fuzzel --dmenu | cliphist decode | wl-copy
exec, grim "$screenshot_dir/$(date +'%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S').png" && paplay $screenshot_sound && notify-send "Screenshot Saved" "Full screen image saved to Hyprland Screenshots."
exec, grim -g "$(slurp)" "$screenshot_dir/$(date +'%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S').png" && paplay $screenshot_sound && notify-send "Screenshot Saved" "Selected area saved to Hyprland Screenshots."
exec, grim -g "$(slurp)" - | wl-copy && paplay $screenshot_sound && notify-send "Screenshot Copied" "Selected area copied to clipboard."
exec, pamixer -t && (pamixer --get-mute | grep -q true && dunstify -i "audio-volume-muted" "Mute" "Muted" -u low -r 9992 || dunstify -i "audio-volume-high" "Mute" "Unmuted" -u low -r 9992)
exec, sudo brightnessctl set 5%+ && $notify_script "display-brightness" "Brightness" "$(brightnessctl -m | awk -F, '{print substr($4, 0, length($4)-1)}')"
exec, sudo brightnessctl set 5%- && $notify_script "display-brightness" "Brightness" "$(brightnessctl -m | awk -F, '{print substr($4, 0, length($4)-1)}')"
